Some Notes:
*Installed Game Size: 11.6GB
*Repack Size: 8.1GB
*Game language: English and other languages
*Audio language: English Only
*To avoid crash and save errors: always run game as Administrator.

THIS RELEASE HAS ALL THE DLC'S RELEASED TILL NOW 27 NOVEMBER 2013
Included New DLC:
- Headhunter 2: Wattle Gobbler
- Headhunter 3: How Marcus Saved Mercenary Day


Inorder to get your saves, start the game till claptrap finds you then quit.
Go to My DocumentsMy GamesBorderlands 2WillowGameSaveData
There should be 2 folders there, one containing your saves and one only the profile.bin file, copy your saves into this folder
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Game Tested on my laptop w/
*AMD A10 4600M 2.3GHZ APU
*Radeon 7660G 512MB DDR3
*8GB DDR3 1600
*Win 8 Pro X64
**Game Played on High Settings w/ 720p resolution @~32 FPS
